statements.statement: SELECT count(*) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = #value#

create table CuvetteBlankNewTb ( WaveLength int Not Null Primary key, Cuv1Blk float Not Null, Cuv2Blk float Not Null, Cuv3Blk float Not Null, Cuv4Blk float Not Null, Cuv5Blk float Not Null, Cuv6Blk create table ManuOffsetGainTb ( WaveLength int null, OffSet int null, Gain int null, Voltage int null )
create table PhotometricGainNewTb ( WaveLength int null, OffSet int null, Gain int null, InspectTime datetime null )
create table PhotometricGainOldTb ( WaveLength int null, OffSet int null, Gain int null, InspectTime datetime null )
create table ManualPhotometricCheckTb ( WaveLength int Not Null Primary key, offset int Null, Gain int Null, Voltage float Null, Absorbance float Null )

create table UserInfoTb ( UserID char(20) Not Null Primary Key, UserName char(20) Not Null, UserPassword char(50) Not Null, CreateTime datetime Not Null, ApplyTask tinyint Not Null Default 0, DataCheck tinyint Not Null Default 0, CalibDataCheck tinyint Not Null Default 0, ReagentSetting tinyint Not Null Default 0, ReagentState tinyint Not Null Default 0, CalibState tinyint Not Null Default 0, CalibMaintain tinyint Not Null Default 0, QCState tinyint Not Null Default 0, QCMaintain tinyint Not Null Default 0, ChemistryParam tinyint Not Null Default 0, CombProject tinyint Not Null Default 0, CalcProject tinyint Not Null Default 0, EnvironmentParam tinyint Not Null Default 0, CrossPollute tinyint Not Null Default 0, LISCommunicate tinyint Not Null Default 0, RouMaintain tinyint Not Null Default 0, EquipDebug tinyint Not Null Default 0, UserManage tinyint Not Null Default 0, DepartManage tinyint Not Null Default 0, DataConfiguration tinyint Not Null Default 0, Configuration tinyint Not Null Default 0, LogCheck tinyint Not Null Default 0, VersionInfo tinyint Not Null Default 0 )
create table UserAuthorizationTb ( UserID char(20) Not Null, AuthorizationKey char(20) Not Null, Constraint PK_UserAuthorization primary key (UserID, AuthorizationKey) )
create table ApplyDepartmentTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, Department char(20) Not Null )
create table ApplyDoctorTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, Department char(20) Not Null, Doctor char(20) Not Null )
create table InspectDoctorTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, Doctor char(20) Not Null )
create table AuditDoctorTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, Doctor char(20) Not Null )

create table ConfigurationTb ( IsSamPanelBarOpen tinyint Not Null Default 0, IsReaPanelBarOpen tinyint Not Null Default 0, IsHandBarOpen tinyint Not Null Default 0, ReagentOpen char(20) Not Null Default 'close' )
create table ReagentTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key Not Null, ReagentPos char(20) Not Null, ReagentChamber char(20) Not Null )
create table MaintainLogTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, UserName char(20) Not Null, LogDetails char(100) Not Null, LogDateTime datetime Not Null )
create table LoginLogTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, UserName char(20) Not Null, LogDetails char(100) Not Null, LogDateTime datetime Not Null )
create table OperateLogTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, UserName char(20) Not Null, LogDetails char(100) Not Null, LogDateTime datetime Not Null )

create table AlarmLog ( ID int auto_increment primary key, FaultCode char(20) Not Null, AlarmReason char(50) Not Null, LogDetails char(100) Null, AlarmLevel char(20) Not Null, UserName char(20) Not Null, LogDateTime datetime Not Null, IsSolve tinyint Not Null )
create table VersionInfoTb ( SerialNum char(20) Not Null, LicenseKey char(20) Not Null, ValidDate datetime Not Null )

create table AssayProjectInfoTb
(
ProjectName char(20) Not Null,
SampleType char(10) Not Null,
ProFullName char(20) Null,
ChannelNum char(20) Null,
Constraint PK_AssayProject primary key (ProjectName, SampleType)
)

create table AssayProjectParamInfoTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(10) Not Null, AnalysisMethod char(20) Null, MeasureLightDot1 int Null, MeasureLightDot2 int Null, MeasureLightDot3 int Null, MeasureLightDot4 int Null, ResultUnit char(20) null, MainWaveLength int Null, SecWaveLength int Null, InstrumentFactorA float Null, InstrumentFactorB float Null, ComStosteVol float Null, ComSamVol float Null, ComDilutionVol float Null, DecStosteVol float Null, DecSamVol float Null, DecDilutionVol float Null, IncStosteVol float Null, IncSamVol float Null, IncDilutionVol float Null, CalibStosteVol float Null, CalibSamVol float Null, CalibDilutionVol float Null, DilutionType char(20) Null, FirstSlope float Null, FirstSlopeHigh float Null, ProLowestBound float Null, BoundDirection char(20) Null, LimitValue float Null, ReactionDirection char(10) Null, Stirring1Intensity char(10) Null, Stirring2Intensity char(10) Null, Reagent1VolSettings float Null, Reagent2VolSettings float Null, SerumCriticalMinimum float null, SerumCriticalMaximum float null, ReagentBlankMinimum float null, ReagentBlankMaximum float null, Constraint PK_AssayProject primary key (ProjectName, SampleType) )

create table CalibrationParamInfoTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(10) Not Null, CalibrationMethod char(20) Null, Point int Null, Span int Null, AbsLimit float Null, DuplicatePercent float Null, DuplicateAbs float Null, SensitivityHigh float Null, SensitivityLow float Null, BlankAbsHigh float Null, BlankAbsLow float Null, CalibrationTimes int Null, AutoCalibration tinyint Null, AutoCalibMask tinyint Null, CalibLotCheck tinyint Null, CalibValidDateCheck tinyint Null, ReagentLotCheck tinyint Null, ReagentValidDateCheck tinyint Null, QCFailed tinyint Null, CalibPos0 char(20) Null, CalibPos1 char(20) Null, CalibPos2 char(20) Null, CalibPos3 char(20) Null, CalibPos4 char(20) Null, CalibPos5 char(20) Null, CalibPos6 char(20) Null, CalibConcentration0 float Null, CalibConcentration1 float Null, CalibConcentration2 float Null, CalibConcentration3 float Null, CalibConcentration4 float Null, CalibConcentration5 float Null, CalibConcentration6 float Null, CalibName0 char(20) Null, CalibName1 char(20) Null, CalibName2 char(20) Null, CalibName3 char(20) Null, CalibName4 char(20) Null, CalibName5 char(20) Null, CalibName6 char(20) Null, Factor float Null, CalibCurveValidDay int Null, Constraint PK_AssayProject primary key (ProjectName, SampleType) )

create table RangeParamInfoTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(10) Not Null, AutoRerun tinyint Null, RepeatLimitLow int Null, RepeatLimitHigh int Null, AgeLow1 int Null, AgeHigh1 int Null, ManConsLow1 float Null, ManConsHigh1 float Null, WomanConsLow1 float Null, WomanConsHigh1 float Null, AgeLow2 int Null, AgeHigh2 int Null, ManConsLow2 float Null, ManConsHigh2 float Null, WomanConsLow2 float Null, WomanConsHigh2 float Null, AgeLow3 int Null, AgeHigh3 int Null, ManConsLow3 float Null, ManConsHigh3 float Null, WomanConsLow3 float Null, WomanConsHigh3 float Null, AgeLow4 int Null, AgeHigh4 int Null, ManConsLow4 float Null, ManConsHigh4 float Null, WomanConsLow4 float Null, WomanConsHigh4 float Null )
create table CombProjectNameInfoTb ( CombProjectName char(50) Not Null primary key, CombProjectCount int Null, Remarks Text Null )
create table CombProjectInfoTb ( CombProjectName Text Not Null, ProjectName Text not Null )

create table CalcProjectInfoTb ( CalcProjectName char(20) Not Null, CalcProjectFullName char(20) Null, Unit char(20) Null, SampleType char(10) Not Null, ReferenceRangeLow float Null, ReferenceRangeHigh float Null, CalcFormula char(50) Null, Constraint PK_AssayProject primary key (CalcProjectName, SampleType) )

create table EnvironmentParamTb ( ReactionDiscTemp float Null, ReagentDiscTemp float Null, CuvetteBlankLow float Null, CuvetteBlankHigh float Null, ReagentSurplus float Null, ReagentLeastVol float Null, AbluentSurplus float Null, AbluentLeastVol float Null, AutoTransferReagentPos tinyint Not Null Default '0', AutoFreezeTask tinyint Not Null Default '0' )
create table DilutionRatioTb ( DilutionRatio float Null )

create table ReagentNeedleAntifoulingStrategyTb ( ReagentNeedle char(20) Not Null, PolluteProName char(20) Not Null, PolluteProType char(20) Null, BePollutedProName char(20) Not NUll, BePollutedProType char(20) Null, CleaningLiquidName char(20) Not Null, CleaningLiquidUseVol float Not Null, CleanTimes int Not Null )

create table CuvetteAntifoulingStrategyTb ( PolluteSourcePro char(20) Not Null, R1CleanLiquidType char(20) Null, R1CleanLiquidUserVol float Null, R1CleanTimes int Null, R2CleanLiquidType char(20) Null, R2CleanLiquidUserVol float Null, R2CleanTimes int Null )
create table SampleNeedleAntifoulingStrategyTb ( PolluteSourcePro char(20) Not Null, CleanLiquidType char(20) Null, CleanLiquidUserVol float Null, CleanTimes int Null )
create table ResultUnitTb ( ID int auto_increment Not Null primary key, Unit char(20) Not Null )
create table NetworkCommunicationTb ( IPAddress char(20) Null, NetworkPort char(10) Null, StartingUp tinyint Not Null, Reconnection tinyint Not Null, RealTimeSendResult tinyint Not Null )

create table SerialCommunicationTb ( SerialName char(10) Null, BaudRate int Null, DataBits int Null, StopBits int Null, Parity int Null, CommunicateionType char(10) Null, CommunicateionOvertime float Null, ReConnectionTime float Null, StartingUp tinyint Not Null, Reconnection tinyint Not Null, RealTimeSendResult tinyint Not Null )

create table QualityControlTb ( QCID INT AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, QCName char(20) Not Null, LotNum char(20) Not Null, Pos char(10) Not Null, InvalidDate datetime Not Null, HorizonLevel char(10) Not Null, Manufacturer char(100) Null, IsLocked tinyint Not Null Default 1, IsLogicalDelete tinyint Not Null Default 0 )

create table QCRelationProjectTb ( ProjectID INT AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(20) Not Null, QCID INT Not Null, TargetMean float Null, TargetSD float Null, Target2SD float Null, Target3SD float Null, constraint FK_QCName foreign key (QCID) references QualityControlTb(QCID) )

create table QualityControlResultTb ( SampleNum char(10) Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(20) Not Null, QCID int Not Null, TCNO int null, AbsValue float null, ConcResult float Null, SampleCreateTime datetime Not Null, IsLogicalEdit tinyint Not Null default 0, IsLogicalDelete tinyint Not Null Default 0, Remarks char(128) Null, )

create table QualityControlResultForUserTb ( ID INT AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, SampleNum char(10) Null, ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(20) Not Null, QCID int Not Null, ConcResult float Null, SampleCreateTime datetime Not Null, IsLogicalEdit tinyint Not Null default 0, IsLogicalDelete tinyint Not Null Default 0 )

create table QCTaskTb ( ID INT AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, SampleNum char(10) Not Null, QCID int Not Null, CreateDate datetime Not Null, Position char(20) Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(20) Not null, InspectTimes int Not Null, SendTimes int Not Null, FinishTimes int Not Null, TaskState int Not Null )
create table CalibratorTb ( CalibName char(20) Not Null primary key, Pos char(10) Not Null, LotNum char(20) Not Null, InvalidDate datetime Not Null, Manufacturer char(50) Not Null )

create table CalibratorinfoTaskTb ( ID INT AUTO_INCREMENT primary key, SampleNum char(10) Not Null, CalibName char(20) Not Null, Pos char(10) Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Not Null, CreateDate datetime Not Null, SampleType char(50) Not Null, InspectTimes int Not Null, SendTimes int Not Null, FinishTimes int Not Null, TaskState int Not Null )

create table CalibrationCurveTb ( CalibName char(20) Not Null , Pos char(10) Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Not Null, CalibConcentration float Not Null, CalibAbs float Null, CalibType char(20) Not Null, Factor float Null, SampleType char(20) Not Null, CalibTime int(4) Not Null )

create table CalibratorProjectTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, CalibName char(20) Not Null, CalibConcentration float Not Null, SampleType char(50) Not Null, constraint FK_CalibName foreign key (CalibName) references CalibratorTb(CalibName) )

create table CalibrationResultTb ( SampleNum char(10) Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(20) Not Null, TCNO int Null, CalibMethod char(20) Not Null, CalibratorName char(20) Not Null, BlankAbs float Null, KFactor float Null, AFactor float Null, BFactor float Null, CFactor float Null, CalibAbs float Null, CalibrationState char(50) Null, CalibrationDT datetime Not Null, CalibConcentration float Not Null, Remarks char(128) Null, constraint FK_SampleNum foreign key (SampleNum) references CalibrationResultTb(SampleNum) )

create table SDTTableItemTb ( ProjectName char(20) Not Null, CalibMethod char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(20) Not Null, BlkAbs float Null, SDT1Abs float Null, SDT2Abs float Null, SDT3Abs float Null, SDT4Abs float Null, SDT5Abs float Null, SDT6Abs float Null, BlkConc float Null, SDT1Conc float Null, SDT2Conc float Null, SDT3Conc float Null, SDT4Conc float Null, SDT5Conc float Null, SDT6Conc float Null, BlkItem char(100) Null, Calib1Item char(100) Null, Calib2Item char(100) Null, Calib3Item char(100) Null, Calib4Item char(100) Null, Calib5Item char(100) Null, Calib6Item char(100) Null, AbsoluteFactor float Null, IsUsed Tinyint null, CalibDate datetime null, DrawDate datetime null, CalibState char(50) Null )

create table ReagentSettingsTb ( Pos char(10) Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Null, ReagentName char(20) Null, ReagentType char(10) Not Null, ReagentChamber char(20) Not Null, ValidDate date Not Null, Barcode char(50) Null, ReagentContainer char(10) Not Null, BatchNum char(20) Not Null, Locked tinyint Not Null )

create table ReagentSettingstbr2 ( Pos char(10) Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Null, ReagentName char(20) Null, ReagentType char(10) Not Null, ReagentChamber char(20) Not Null, ValidDate date Not Null, Barcode char(50) Null, ReagentContainer char(10) Not Null, BatchNum char(20) Not Null, Locked tinyint Not Null )

create table ReagentStateinfor1r2 ( ProjectName char(20) Null, Locked tinyint Not Null, ReagentName char(20) Null, ReagentName2 char(20) Null, ResidualQuantity char(20) Null, ResidualQuantity2 char(20) Null, Pos char(20) Null, Pos2 char(20) Null, ReagentType char(20) Null, ReagentType2 char(20) Null, BatchNum char(20) Null, BatchNum2 char(20) Null, ReagentContainer char(20) Null, ReagentContainer2 char(20) Null, ReagentManufacturers char(50) Null, ReagentManufacturers2 char(50) Null, ReagentResidualVol float null, ReagentResidualVol2 float null, ValidPercent int null, ValidPercent2 int null )

create table PatientInfoTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, SampleNum int Not Null, InputTime datetime Not Null , SampleID char(20) Null, PatientName char(20) Null, BirthDate datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), Age int Null, Sex char(10) Null, PatientType char(10) Null, InspectTime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), BedNum char(20) Null, ApplyDepartment char(20) Null, ApplyDoctor char(20) Null, AuditDoctor char(20) Null, InspectDoctor char(20) Null, SamplingTime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), ApplyTime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), ClinicalDiagnosis text Null, Remarks text Null )

create table SampleTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, SampleNum int Not Null, CreateTime datetime Not Null, SampleState int Null, SamContainer char(10) Not Null, SampleType char(10) Not Null, Barcode char(50) Null, PanelNum int Not Null, SamplePos int Not Null, IsOperateDilution tinyint Not Null default 0, IsEmergency tinyint Not Null default 0, IsPrinted tinyint Not Null default 0, IsSend tinyint Not Null default 0, IsDelete tinyint Not Null default 0, IsAudit tinyint Not Null default 0 )

create table SampleResultTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, SampleNum int Not Null, SampleCreateTime datetime Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(20) Not Null, TCNO int Null, AbsValue float Null, ConcResult float Null, SampleCompletionTime NULL, SampleCompletionStatus NULL, Remarks char(128) Null, IsResurvey tinyint Not Null Default 0, Confirm tinyint Null, ResultVolType varchar(20) null )

create table TaskTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, SampleNum int Not Null, CreateDate datetime Not Null, ProjectName char(20) Not Null, SampleType char(20) Null, SampleDilute char(10) Not Null, DilutedRatio float Null, InspectTimes int Not Null, SendTimes int Not Null, FinishTimes int Not Null, TaskState int Not Null, IsReRun bit null )
create table CalcTaskTb ( SampleNum int Not Null, CreateDate datetime Not Null, ProjectName char(50) Not Null, SampleType char(50) Null )

create table RunningStateTb ( WorkDisk int null, LastestSMPNO int null, MachineStyle char(10) null, LastestTC int null, R1PanelTemp float null, R2PanelTemp float null, CUVPanelTemp float null, CUVBlkMin float null, CUVBlkMax float null, TempOffset float null, RgtWarnCount int null, RgtLeastCount int null, QCSMPContainerType char(20) null, SDTSMPContainerType char(20) null, DrawDate datetime null, IsMutiRgtEnable tinyint null, IsLockRgtEnable tinyint null, IsAutoExchange tinyint null, State1 int null, State2 int null, MachineIsRunning tinyint Null )

create table TroubleLogTb ( ID int auto_increment primary key, DrawDate datetime null, TroubleCode text null, TroubleInfo text null, TroubleType char(50) null, TroubleUnit char(20) null, IsConfirm tinyint not null default false )
create table DetergentVolTb ( DetergentACount int null, DetergentBCount int null, ABarcode text null, BBarcode text null )
create table DertergentInfoTb ( DetergentAFullCount int null, DetergentACostPerHour int null, DetergentBFullCount int null, DetergentBCostPerHour int null )
create table DetergentUsingTimerTb ( StartingTime datetime null, FinishingTime datetime null )
create table RealTimeCUVDataTb ( WorkNo int null, CuvNo int null, SmpNo char(50) null, Assay char(50) null, TC int null, CUVPoint int null, WorkType char(50) null, DrawDate datetime null )
